question: Checking in between the church and reception
answer: The reception is 10 miles from the church (just under a 25-minute drive), so we've left enough time for guests to check-in to their accommodation after the ceremony.
The ceremony starts at {{ceremonyStart}}, and the reception starts at {{receptionStart}}.

question: Taxis
answer: We advise pre-booking taxis when you will need them, especially after the reception, as we've been told getting a taxi after 11pm can be very difficult.

question: Children
answer: In order to meet guest number restrictions, we are only able to extend our invitation to our niece and nephews and we cannot accommodate any other children or babies.
We hope that you understand this decision and that you will still be able to join us on our special day.
